last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Plan
last_episode_to_air.overview: Two years later, Elsa and friends look back on the moments that changed the course of their lives — and brought them closer than ever.

name: The Hook Up Plan
overview: In a misguided attempt to build up perpetually single Elsa's confidence, her friends hire a male escort. A comedy series set in Paris.

episodes.name: The Secret Plan
episodes.overview: Two years after a breakup, Elsa is still obsessed with her ex. But when she meets dreamy schoolteacher Jules, her outlook on life begins to change.

episodes.name: The Sloppy Plan
episodes.overview: After learning the truth, Milou tries to steer Elsa away from Jules, while Charlotte ups the ante by orchestrating a magical second date.

episodes.name: The Booty Plan
episodes.overview: Elsa comes unglued when she discovers her friends have been hiding big news from her. Milou has a change of heart about Charlotte's scheme.

episodes.name: The Love Plan
episodes.overview: Elsa navigates a dizzying swirl of emotions after her night with Jules. Matthieu makes a confession. Antoine springs a surprise on Milou.

episodes.name: The Party Plan
episodes.overview: Simmering tensions, unexpected guests and romantic rivalries lead to mayhem at Elsa's 30th birthday party.

episodes.name: The Lame Plan
episodes.overview: Anaïs drops in for a visit as Elsa wrestles with growing doubts about Jules. A moment of reckoning pushes longtime friendships to the breaking point.

episodes.name: The Solo Plan
episodes.overview: As a shell-shocked Elsa takes stock of her life, Jules and Max vie for her attention. Matthieu helps Charlotte with a new business idea.

episodes.name: The Exit Plan
episodes.overview: Milou goes into labor, Elsa prepares to embark on a new adventure, and Jules realizes he may have one last chance to turn things around.

episodes.name: The Homecoming Plan
episodes.overview: After a blissful four months, Elsa announces her return to Paris. But she has mixed feelings about reconnecting with the old gang.

episodes.name: The Llama Plan
episodes.overview: Milou and Charlotte give Max a makeover, Julio catches a big break with his music, and Elsa stumbles deeper into a double life.

episodes.name: The Backup Plan
episodes.overview: When Elsa's lies come back to bite her, she vows to tell her friends the truth. But a surprise bachelor party upends everyone's day.

episodes.name: The Pick-Up Plan
episodes.overview: Elsa begs her friends for forgiveness, Milou dips her toe into a confusing new world, and Charlotte finds her business on the brink of disaster.

episodes.name: The After Plan
episodes.overview: After the city announces the winner of the barge contract, Elsa drops another bombshell. Meanwhile, a rendezvous turns into a wake-up call for Julio.

episodes.name: The Love Plan
episodes.overview: A sudden revelation brings the whole gang together for a day of celebration, mischief and romantic mayhem.

episodes.name: The Wrong Plan
episodes.overview: As Elsa channels all her energy into getting pregnant, Charlotte helps Max run for office, and Milou contends with the loneliness of country life.

episodes.name: The War Plan
episodes.overview: On a group outing, Elsa and Charlotte begin to play nice — but they each have ulterior motives. Antoine tries to sabotage the sale of the house.

episodes.name: The High and Dry Plan
episodes.overview: While Elsa and Julio adjust to an awkward living arrangement, Charlotte begins to see Max in a new light, and Milou lands a job with a celebrity.

episodes.name: The Worst Plan
episodes.overview: Charlotte decides it's time to rethink her priorities, Elsa embarks on fertility treatments, and Milou wrestles with doubts about the pregnancy.

episodes.name: The Sorority Plan
episodes.overview: At the country house, Charlotte and Milou try to help Max overcome his alpha male instincts. Difficult news leads Elsa to a turning point.

episodes.name: The Final Plan
episodes.overview: Two years later, Elsa and friends look back on the moments that changed the course of their lives — and brought them closer than ever.
